name: mozilla-helper-suite
description: Unified Mozilla helper extension: Gmail Bugzilla linkifier, Phabricator inline video player, Bugzilla markdown paste helper.

scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p build && cp -r manifest.json background.js options.html options.js popup.html popup.js settings.js content src icons build/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:xpi && npm run lint:webext
